top_comments_top.body: Maybe don't put in "Knockin on Heaven's Door"
Whatever your playlist, if it doesn't have Jefferson Airplane's "White Rabbit" on, it ain't no good!  And (medical ref) it is kinda about taking the right pills... :)

I'm From Barcelona — [Paper Planes](https://youtu.be/NlXJljEY8c0)

Architecture in Helsinki — [Heart It Races](https://youtu.be/4602M6yj2-8)
I don't worry about a thing - Jorge Drexler

Pink Floyd - Coming back to life

Coldplay - Fix you

Prodigy - Take me to the Hospital

Skunk Anansie - Weak
